---
title: "Update a document via changelogs"
description: "post https://api-joy.joyfill.io/v1/documents/{identifier}/changelogs"
---

# Overview

**❗️Important Note** - Not all changelogs generated by Joyfill SDK(s) can be used with this endpoint. Only the changelogs listed below are supported.

All changelogs generated by an SDK in `fill` mode are supported.

Any changelogs sent to this API endpoint that are not in the supported list will simply be ignored.

[Changelog Learn More](/docs/changelogs)

### Supported Changelogs

* `field.update`
* `field.value.rowDelete`
* `field.value.rowUpdate`
* `field.value.rowMove`
* `field.value.rowCreate`
